task.title: Integrating the Plugin with the DocBook XSL Distribution

prereq.p:
The WebHelp plugin transformations run as an Ant build script. The requirements are:
Ant 1.8 or later
Java Virtual Machine 1.6 or later
DocBook XSL 1.78.1 or later
Saxon 6.5.5
Saxon 9.1.0.8

context.p: To integrate the plugin with the DocBook XSL distribution, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Download and install a Java Virtual Machine 1.6 or later.
Download and install Ant 8.0 or later.
Go to website, download the latest DocBook version of the installation kit, and unzip it in the DocBook XSL directory (/frameworks/docbook/xsl).
step.stepresult: The DocBook XSL directory should now contain a new subdirectory named com.oxygenxml.webhelp and two new files, oxygen_custom.xsl and oxygen_custom_html.xsl.

step.cmd: If you have not already done so, copy your license key into a licensekey.txt file and place it in the /frameworks/docbook/xsl/com.oxygenxml.webhelp directory.
Download and unzip saxon6-5-5.zip on your computer.
Download and unzip saxonb9-1-0-8j.zip on your computer.
